name: Wizard's Conquest
description: For Oculus Quest. Wizard's Conquest is a multiplayer battle arena game where you are teleported to different worlds via a magical beacon which you must defend from undead hordes and Wizards from the opposing faction. There are two teams not including the undead. Each team gets a Home Beacon and there are inner beacons which you must capture in order to expel the other team's barrier which is protecting their Home Beacon. Upon capturing all of the beacons, your team will be victorious.
